class.source: (python_3, True), (python_2, False)]) def proc(request, spawnu, TIMEOUT): container, instant_mode = request.param proc = spawnu(*container) proc.sendline(u'pip install /src') assert proc.expect([TIMEOUT, u'Successfully installed']) proc.sendline(init_zshrc.format( u'--enable-experimental-instant-mode' if instant_mode else '')) proc.sendline(u"zsh") if instant_mode: assert proc.expect([TIMEOUT, u'instant mode ready: True']) return proc

(python_3, True), (python_2, False)]) def proc(request, spawnu, TIMEOUT): container, instant_mode = request.param proc = spawnu(*container) proc.sendline(u"pip install /src") assert proc.expect([TIMEOUT, u'Successfully installed']) proc.sendline(init_bashrc.format( u'--enable-experimental-instant-mode' if instant_mode else '')) proc.sendline(u"bash") if instant_mode: assert proc.expect([TIMEOUT, u'instant mode ready: True']) return proc
